attributes.action: Reduce the amount of cash given to J.S.A and to replace with food vouchers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It will reduce taxpayer’s money being spent on alcohol, cigarettes and drugs!

That is typical to many areas, it will also encourage 'the non trustworthy seekers' to look for a job.

Maybe the vouchers could only be spent in a shop opened and run by the government, which had no alcohol and cigarettes for sale
